name: BLOCK HOCK
description:
Block Hock aka Block Hockey aka Street Hockey. Play on the block your game of hockey...Hey it's a protoype for the lo rez jam using PIX64 console (included and/or get it here Pix64 by ZappedCow (itch.io) and navigate to BLOCK HOCK)

Play as blue to get puck in green goal.  I'm trying to make more prototypes for game jam to see which ones (if any) you think could be turned into a fun multilevel game leave comments/feedback! Thanks.
